name: Welcome to Slime Island
description:
What a day! After being stranded at sea, you managed to find an island to stay on, however, after you get on to the island, you notice a tiny problem, slime are falling from the sky! And to add insult to injury, there's also robot bosses! Bosses are defeated by hitting their electricity chip:Well, at least you get health crates and powerups. How long will you survive Slime Island?

Controls:

Move LeftLeft Arrow Key, S.Move RightRight Arrow Key, D.JumpUp Arrow Key, W, Space.

Credits:

A.J.: Programing, Art, Sound Effects.

Shawn: Music.

The font is Film Cryptic and made by GemFonts.
